*div1 type="summary"* *p*Petition for permit to establish a road through the Neches bottom and a ferry across the river.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*To the Honorable The *person_mentioned*Authorities and Representatives of the Government of the *location_mentioned*Province of Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*The Petition of *person_mentioned*John McGaffey*/person_mentioned* Respectfully represents that Your *person_mentioned*Petitioner */person_mentioned*is a *person_mentioned*Citizen of the *location_mentioned*United States of North America*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, that he has of late taken up his residence in this *location_mentioned*Province of Texas*/location_mentioned* With an intention of becoming a Faithfull and Usefull Citizen thereof.*/p*
*p*Your *person_mentioned*Petitioner */person_mentioned*has with great pains and under Considerable disadvantages, partially Established a Ferry to Cross the *location_mentioned*River Neige [Neches?]*/location_mentioned* on the *location_mentioned*old Teskasito Road*/location_mentioned* leading to *location_mentioned*Trinity*/location_mentioned*: With a view to be enabled to Make good Roads *location_mentioned*through the swamps and Marshes*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*adjacent to the Banks of said River*/location_mentioned*, Your *person_mentioned*Petitioner */person_mentioned*Respectfully solicits the aid of the *person_mentioned*Government*/person_mentioned*, to grant a Right to him of *location_mentioned*a small Bank on the east side of the River*/location_mentioned* whereon to build a *location_mentioned*Ferry House*/location_mentioned*, and a Right to improve *location_mentioned*Two Miles of Road through the swamps and Marshes of the same side*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*Your *person_mentioned*Petitioner */person_mentioned*Would beg leave to represent that the *location_mentioned*West side of the Banks of said River*/location_mentioned* is surounded with an *location_mentioned*immense Marsh */location_mentioned*of three miles through, subject to overflow, that he would respectfully solicit a Right to these *location_mentioned*Marshes */location_mentioned*which would enable him for the first year, to Make good *location_mentioned*Roads */location_mentioned*of three miles long *location_mentioned*on the West side*/location_mentioned*, and Two Miles *location_mentioned*on the East side Leading to and from the Banks of said River Neige*/location_mentioned* and in the space of Five Years he would obligate himself to Make the Whole distance of Five Miles a high and Complete *location_mentioned*Turnpike Road*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*As a Compensation for his pains and trouble Your *person_mentioned*Petitioner*/person_mentioned* respectfully solicit a Right to a*location_mentioned* League of Land Most convenient and adjacent to the Ferry */location_mentioned*for the Maintainance and support of himself and *person_mentioned*Familly */person_mentioned*also to Exact from *person_mentioned*travellers */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Emigrants */person_mentioned*a small Compensation for Ferriage*/p*
*p*Your *person_mentioned*Petitionner */person_mentioned*Respectfully hopes that from the importance and immense utility and Convenience to *person_mentioned*travellers */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Emigrants */person_mentioned*of a Well regulated Ferry your Honorable Body Will view his Petition With a favorable Eye and Will be pleased to grant him the object of his Petition*/p*
*p*And as in duty bound Your *person_mentioned*petitionner */person_mentioned*will ever be gratfull and obedient to the Laws of this *location_mentioned*Province*/location_mentioned*!*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John McGAFFEY */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*River Neige*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-10-1826">10th Jany 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*We the *person_mentioned*Undersigners*/person_mentioned*, entertaining the Most favorable opinion of the Integrity Industry and Sobriety of *person_mentioned*Mr. John McGaffey*/person_mentioned* and being Confident of his Capability to fulfill the Conditions of the solicited *location_mentioned*grant*/location_mentioned*, also, from the importance of the Establishment of a Ferry to this *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned* beg leave respectfully to recommend him.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*George Orr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
